item.title: Which Linux Version is running
item.description: Sometimes you need to know, which Linux distro you are running, and especially, which version: lsb_release -a The answer will look like: No LSB modules are available Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description: Ubuntu 14.04.3 LTS Release: 14.04 Codename: trusty
